title: Could somone please tell me the name of the song used in the MSI highlight videos?

embed.description: Day 3 of the Mid-Season Invitational starts now. Which semifinal teams will make it to the finals?

replies.body: We made this track in-house. There's a good chance it'll be on Soundcloud in the near future ;)
Speaking of soundcloud, I was checking it out yesterday, but I couldn't find Azir's login music. Any reason why it's not on there?
It's on there. "Rise Of The Ascended"
Thanks ChemicalSeb! Can't wait to hear the next music you put out!

> [{quoted}](name=Chemicalseb,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=q1mhefK9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-11T20:28:38.528+0000)
>
> We made this track in-house. There's a good chance it'll be on Soundcloud in the near future ;)

I really really love it a lot! Is there any way possible i could somehow listen to this now?
I was about to post the mp3 here but it's not a supported file type for upload.... :(
I'm trying to expedite this for you guys. I'm hoping it'll be up there soon....   Sorry for the wait :/

I didn't realize how impatient I sounded there, sorry! D:
(It's up now, thanks a bunch Chemicalseb!)

> [{quoted}](name=Chemicalseb,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=q1mhefK9,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T06:48:36.642+0000)
>
> I was about to post the mp3 here but it's not a supported file type for upload.... :(

Please let me know if you managed to get it up somewhere :))

> [{quoted}](name=Utora,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=q1mhefK9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T00:48:18.605+0000)
>
> whyyyyyyyyyy

Whoops! Wrong link!

Don't worry, I fixed it now! [Enjoy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ef7ZCP2XiAU) the cut!

> [{quoted}](name=Garurumon,realm=EUW,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=q1mhefK9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-11T17:43:10.777+0000)
>
> [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y6120QOlsfU) it is.

Knew what it was, clicked on it anyway...listening to it now.

1. Also, new Risen {{champion:9}} theme song anyone??

I can tell you where to download the Mp3's

Kat.ph , or just google torrents although be careful as most content has Copyrights, Plus watch what you download because a lot of stuff can have virus, or false positives, but I download torrents and stream torrents all the time no problems.

Although I have had this one for years got the entire collection part of the old day addon's for some games I played many years ago.

If you have a creative sound card you can always just record the music from the What U hear option.

Are you talking about this specific song? I would like to know where to get this specific song.
